sentences.en: “I think the Spanish and Italian people are very similar in terms of their character so I feel comfortable here, ” began the Spaniard.
sentences.cn: “我认为西班牙人和意大利人性格特征非常相似，因此我在这里感到非常舒适。” 这个西班牙人说。

sentences.en: A neutral might argue a case for the Spaniard.
sentences.cn: 中立的球迷可能会更倾向于为辩护.

sentences.en: Although any European could qualify, it was a Spaniard in this instance.
sentences.cn: 虽然任何一位欧洲人都能合格, 在这个例子中是西班牙人.

sentences.en: He finished ahead of the Spaniard, and in the process picked up his first time trial win as a pro.
sentences.cn: 他领先那个西班牙人到达终点，同时也首次作为职业选手获得计时赛的胜利。

sentences.en: He is doing a really good job at Chelsea, the Spaniard said.
sentences.cn: [安切诺蒂在切尔西很出色.]西班牙人说.

sentences.en: Is she a Spaniard or an Italian?
sentences.cn: 她是西班牙人还是意大利人?

sentences.en: Lopez upset fellow Spaniard and fourth seed David Ferrer 6 - 4 6 - 3.
sentences.cn: 洛佩兹之前以6比4、6比3击败了同为西班牙人的4号种子大卫·费雷罗.

sentences.en: Lucius Verus : Are you the digit they call the Spaniard?
sentences.cn: 卢修斯: 你就是他们称作西班牙人的人?

sentences.en: No Spaniard had been seen. Nobody had entered or left the alley. Everything was auspicious.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人没露面, 巷子里也没人走动, 一切平安无事.

sentences.en: She's either a Spaniard or an Italian. I am not sure.
sentences.cn: 她不是西班牙人便是意大利人. 我不能肯定.

sentences.en: That victory came two weeks after he beat the Spaniard to win the Indian Wells Masters 1000 title.
sentences.cn: 两周后，他又在1000分系列赛——印第安威尔斯大师赛上击败了西班牙人获得冠军。

sentences.en: The Spaniard also denied Renault were sandbagging.
sentences.cn: 同时西班牙人否认了雷诺在负重奔跑.

sentences.en: The Spaniard and the Indian are diametrically opposed.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人与印第安人恰好相反.

sentences.en: The Spaniard gallantly fought off 11 set points before Seles won 8-6.
sentences.cn: 这名西班牙运动员顽强地挽救了11个赛点，最终以6比8输给了塞莱斯。

sentences.en: The Spaniard tried to explain his remarks after today's qualifying.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人还就今天排位赛后他的一些评论做出了解释.

sentences.en: Where will be then this fabulous feeling of being Spaniard?
sentences.cn: 否则这种作为西班牙人的美妙感觉要从哪里来 呢 ?

sentences.en: You know something about that Spaniard that you want to keep dark.
sentences.cn: 你了解那个西班牙人的一些情况,你想隐瞒?
